website_summaries.verdict: Those who prefer glass to plastic will crave this uniquely designed insulated freezer mug that both looks fantastic and is great for everyday use.
pros: Keeps beer cold longer than a regular pint glass
Users love its appearance, and claim they get so many comments on it
Great as a gift, and comes with a box to wrap
cons: Will break easier than a plastic mug if dropped
Glass should also be completely dry before going in the freezer

I did not expect that i would be warned about putting the glass in the dishwasher because that might disengage a manufacturing plug on the bottom of the glass. It must be washed by hand. However, that is no taxing chore just a minor inconvenience in exchange for the satisfaction the glass has given me. I think it's a fair trade.
